scriptsComments.watch-sass: Watches and compiles sass without autoprefixing or compressing. Run this during development to compile new sass.
scriptsComments.compile-sass: Compiles sass to styles.comp.css, to then be prefixed and compressed. Part of the build process, which should be run at the end of development.
scriptsComments.prefix-css: Prefixes styles.comp.css and outputs to styles.prefix.css to then be compressed. Part of the build process, which should be run at the end of development.
scriptsComments.compress-css: Compresses styles.prefix.css and outputs to main.css. Part of the build process, which should be run at the end of development.
scriptsComments.delete-css: Deletes the left over styles.comp.css and styles.prefix.css files. Part of the build process, which should be run at the end of development.
scriptsComments.build-css: Compiles, prefixes and compresses the styles. Should be run at the end of development.
scriptsComments.deploy-ghpages: Uses push-dir to push the /dist directory to a gh-pages (GitHub Pages) branch, to view on GitHub Pages.
